compounddef.title: Final Project "Humedity and Temperature sensing system based in ESP32 WROOM-32"

sect1.title: General Description
sect1.para: Final Project for the Course Embedded Systems Programming and Architecture. It involves the sensing and visualization of temperature and humidity values. The project uses the Espressif ESP32 WROOM module, the DHT11 humidity sensor, and a LCD screen.

sect1.title: Hardware setup
sect1.para: For running this firmware it is necesary, DHT11 sensor, LCD screen with Expansor module PCF8574AT chip, and ESP32_WROOM module kit.
